name: Two Rays of Light Among the Clouds

Ginkaku and Kinkaku stand on the front and back sides of the opponent, the former starting by releasing a fire ball with [[Bashōsen]], following with the latter using the suction of [[Benihisago]] to kick the opponent and then finishing them by raising the opponent with earth through Bashōsen and channeling electricity through [[Shichiseiken]], releasing an electric surge by slamming down on them.
